name: SingAlongDoReMiFaSo
0:
”Alexa, start Sing Along”
”Alexa, ask Sing Along for help”
”Doe Me Sew”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sing along
des: The skill will play a rhythm, and you should repeat the rhythm using sol-fa names, i.e. 'Do, Re, Mi, Fa, So, La, Ti'. The rhythm gets longer when you answer correctly.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
